Developer Terms of Use
des:
It’s no secret that calming music can reduce stress and enhance daily harmony.

Enjoy the high-quality sleep sounds and wake up refreshed. Gain a high-quality sleep you never had!

GOLD MEMBERSHIP:
+ Premium audio quality
+ Longer sound loop
+ Unlimited hours of music

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate Rain Sounds when you need to relax. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, your can select Voice and then type “Time to Relax”
5. Tap “Add action” and select “Skills”
6. Tap Your skills and find the "Rain Sounds” skill in the list. Make sure to select the one by "Ektara"
7. Tap “Save” in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

When you're ready to relax, say, “Alexa, Time to Relax”

MORE RELAXING SOUNDS ON ALEXA
 You can find more high-quality sleep and relaxing sounds by Ektara on Alexa.
 - Spa Music
 - Music Of Peace
 - Spanish Guitar
 - Morning Music
 - Om Mantra

MORE INFO
Relaxing Sounds are perfect for helping you with deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It is the best sound for stress relief. Our calm and relaxing sleep music can be used as a background for meditation, relaxation, peace, and sleep sounds. Let the soothing and calming sounds help you relax.
This skill is perfect for helping you with deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It is the best sound for stress relief. Our sleep music will also ensure you rest deeply and wake up refreshed.

This music is solely designed for personal development, learning, and relaxation or to support motivation. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. There are no medical claims intended. Call your doctor to receive medical advice.
